name: Kepler
description: AVIA is the native token of an innovative project developed by Kepler, a company specializing in the aeronautics sector. This project aims to modernize and optimize the value chains of the aerospace industry through blockchain-based solutions. AVIA is designed to facilitate transactions, enhance traceability, and improve operational efficiency within this ecosystem. Leveraging decentralized technologies, the project seeks to provide greater transparency and improved connectivity for stakeholders in the aeronautics industry.
